response.overview: The strange teacher began his life poor, and the methods of theft and manipulation and fraud to become rich as a trader in savings to be able to rent a large factory, and turns to the unjust and greedy and loves a beautiful girl and marry her after stipulating him to write part of his wealth, Saber poor young handsome teacher is treated by a strange operator in his factory and rent a room for him. At the top of the floor of his building where he falls in love with Azza, who lives with her father in the next room, which exchange the love of the naughty, and also approached him as the wife of the teacher strange, and tries to lure him, but refrain from Abba
response.title: العمله النادره
